long_description: The simple Crazy Creek Original chair provides a surprisingly comfortable seat on the beach or in camp. Durable coated ripstop nylon cushioned with 0.5 in.-thick closed-cell foam insulates you from the cold ground. Sturdy, lightweight carbon fiber stays offer firm yet flexible support. Side webbing straps with quick-release buckles adjust your sitting position. Crazy Creek Original chair is lightweight and packable with handles for easy carrying; rip-and-stick straps keep chair closed when you're on the go.
short_description: The simple Crazy Creek Original chair provides a surprisingly comfortable seat on the beach or in camp.
